title: Ranked Rewards
body: I got into Silver 5 on the second last day of the season and I still haven't received any of my rewards such as my Silver border is there a set date when we receive them?

replies.body: Don't fret just yet! Ranked rewards are still going out over the course of Nov, and some will see there's before others but that's okay. If you don't see any of your rewards by the end of Nov hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
Why do our profiles not get a border anymore? Why not a profile border and insignia?
